00034 /*
00035  * This class provides a filesystem cache. Cache entries can be requested and
00036  * are dated at the time of the request.
00037  *
00038  * The current implementation gets the date once at class creation. All files
00039  * in the cache are evaluated on class creation and are deleted if eligable.
00040  *
00041  * $symon['cache_keepstale'] : set to disable file deletion.
00042  *
00043  * Typical use:
00044  *
00045  * $key = $cache->insert(content, <content_identifiers>+);
00046  * $filename = $cache->getfilename($key);
00047  * $cache->expire($key);
00048  *
00049  * Use obtain_file_cache(key) to get a direct filename to a cache entry with
00050  * key <key>.
00051  */
00052 require_once("setup.inc");
00053 require_once("tools.inc");
00054 
00055 class Cache {
00056     var $db;
00057     var $timestamp;
00058 
00059     function Cache() {
00060     global $symon;
00061 
00062     if (!isset($symon["cache_duration"])) {
00063         config_error("cache_duration", "is not set");
00064         return 0;
00065     }
00066     if (!isset($symon["cache_dir"])) {
00067         config_error("cache_dir", "is not set");
00068         return 0;
00069     }
00070     if (!is_dir($symon["cache_dir"])) {
00071         config_error("cache_dir", "does not point to a directory");
00072         return 0;
00073     }
00074 
00075     return $this->_load();
00076     }
00077 
00078     function _load() {
00079     global $symon;
00080 
00081     $ts = time();
00082     $this->timestamp = $ts - ($ts % $symon["cache_duration"]);
00083 
00084     $dir = dir($symon["cache_dir"]);
00085     while ($file = $dir->read()) {
00086         if ($file == '.' || $file == '..') {
00087         continue;
00088         }
00089         if (!is_file($symon["cache_dir"].'/'.$file)) {
00090         runtime_error("'".$file."' is not a cache file");
00091         return 0;
00092         }
00093 
00094         $this->_cache($file);
00095     }
00096     }
00097 
00098     function _cache($filename) {
00099     global $symon;
00100 
00101     if (preg_match("/^([0-9]+)_([0-9a-f]+)(\.[a-z]+)?$/i",
00102                $filename, $match)) {
00103         $this->db[$match[2]] = $filename;
00104         if (($this->timestamp > $match[1]) &&
00105         (!isset($symon['cache_keepstale']))) {
00106         $this->expire_key($match[2]);
00107         }
00108     } else {
00109         runtime_error("'".$filename."' is not a cache file");
00110         return 0;
00111     }
00112     }
00113 
00114     function _iscached($filename) {
00115     if (preg_match("/^([0-9]+)_([0-9a-f]+)(\.[a-z]+)?$/i",
00116                $filename, $match)) {
00117         return isset($this->db[$match[2]]);
00118     } else {
00119         if (preg_match("/^([0-9a-f]+)(\.[a-z]+)?$/i",
00120                $filename, $match)) {
00121         return isset($this->db[$match[1]]);
00122         } else {
00123         return isset($this->db[$filename]);
00124         }
00125     }
00126     }
00127 
00128     function _get($filename) {
00129     if (preg_match("/^([0-9]+)_([0-9a-f]+)(\.[a-z]+)?$/i",
00130                $filename, $match)) {
00131         if (isset($this->db[$match[2]])) {
00132         return $this->db[$match[2]];
00133         }
00134     } else {
00135         if (preg_match("/^([0-9a-f]+)(\.[a-z]+)?$/i",
00136                $filename, $match)) {
00137         if (isset($this->db[$match[1]])) {
00138             return $this->db[$match[1]];
00139         }
00140         } else {
00141         if (isset($this->db[$filename])) {
00142             return $this->db[$filename];
00143         }
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147     return undef;
00148     }
00149 
00150     function insert(&$content, $extension = '') { /* variadric */
00151     $args = '';
00152     $maxargs = func_num_args();
00153     $arg_list = func_get_args();
00154     for ($i = 0; $i < $maxargs; $i++) {
00155         if (is_array($arg_list[$i])) {
00156         $args .= join($arg_list[$i]);
00157         } elseif (is_scalar($arg_list[$i])) {
00158         $args .= $arg_list[$i];
00159         } else {
00160         runtime_error('cache: wrong type of argument '.gettype($arg_list[$i]) .' in "insert"');
00161         }
00162     }
00163 
00164     $key = md5($args);
00165 
00166     if (!$this->_iscached($key)) {
00167         $this->_cache($this->timestamp . '_' . $key . $extension);
00168         $filename = $this->getfilename($key);
00169         if (strlen($content) > 0) {
00170         save($filename, $content);
00171         }
00172     }
00173 
00174     return $key;
00175     }
00176 
00177     function obtain_filecache($key) {
00178     if (!$this->_iscached($key)) {
00179         $this->_cache($this->timestamp . '_' . $key);
00180     }
00181 
00182     return $this->getfilename($key);
00183     }
00184 
00185     function getfilename($key) {
00186     global $symon;
00187 
00188     if ($this->_iscached($key)) {
00189         $filename = $this->_get($key);
00190         return $symon["cache_dir"].'/'.$filename;
00191     } else {
00192         return '';
00193     }
00194     }
00195 
00196     function expire_key($key) {
00197     global $runtime_args;
00198 
00199     $filename = $this->getfilename($key);
00200     if (is_file($filename)) {
00201         if (!unlink($filename)) {
00202         runtime_error("'".$filename."' cannot be deleted");
00203         }
00204     }
00205 
00206     unset($this->db[$key]);
00207     }
00208 
00209     function _expire_all() {
00210     if (is_array($this->db)) {
00211         foreach($this->db as $key => $value) {
00212         $this->expire_key($key);
00213         }
00214     }
00215     }
00216 
00217     function _display() {
00218     if (is_array($this->db)) {
00219         foreach($this->db as $key => $value) {
00220         print "\xa ".$key.'='.$value;
00221         }
00222     }
00223     }
00224 
00225     function _test() {
00226     $r1 = 'this is recipe 1';
00227     $r2 = 'this is recipe 2';
00228 
00229     print "\xa display current cache";
00230     $this->_display();
00231 
00232     print "\xa flushing cache";
00233     $this->_expire_all();
00234 
00235     print "\xa insert tests 1 2 3";
00236     $c1 = $this->insert($r1);
00237     $c2 = $this->insert($r1, '.txt');
00238     $c3 = $this->insert($r2);
00239 
00240     print "\xa display current cache\xa";
00241     $this->_display();
00242     print "\xa flushing cache";
00243     $this->_expire_all();
00244     }
00245 }
00246 
00247 if (!isset($cache)) {
00248     $cache = new Cache();
00249 }
